p: Figure 2 depicts the risk (A-B), exposure (C-D), safety margin (E-F) and potential adaptive capacity (G-H) of vegetation to projected rates of climate change by 2070 under RCP 8.5. Brown regions in (A) and (B) indicate locations where exposure to climate change exceeds the safety margin of vegetation based on current MAT and MAP, and vice versa for blue locations. Values for each location are available in Supplementary Table S2.
